This person who bankrupted themselves multiple times managed to accrue and maintain enough money from domestic and alleged foreign donators to be able to know beyond the shadow of a doubt that his actions would be manipulating the stock market. Trump, decided that he needed to obstruct justice and demanded that Congress obstruct it for him, and instead of passing a reasonable budget in a timely manner, the house of representatives obeyed him and went home.  This guy, who says mean things on the internet about judges, and they face death threats as a repercussion.  This man, who has been convicted of fraud and over thirty other crimes, I allege to be successfully Defrauding the United States. This is seen through publicly available information. This is the guy who signed an executive order that states people born in the United States aren't citizens because their parents were here illegally and therefore not subject to our laws.  This person publicly stated he could murder someone in broad daylight and still win the election.  This guy who replaced the secretary of defense with an entertainment personality. This guy knows he's supposed to enforce the Constitution; it is a core component of preserving said document. He is not incompetent. He is extremely competent at committing his crimes.
